about_the_game:
"BRAND NEW WORLD: IN DEVELOPMENT!"
This game is still in active development, and we are very grateful for your interest and support! By purchasing the game now, you will have the opportunity to become a part of our development community and help us make Brand New World even better.
Your contribution to the development: Buying the game at this stage will allow you to not only enjoy your first impressions, but also contribute to the development. We are actively looking for detailed bug reports, feedback, and your ideas to further improve the game.
Development is going steadily: We understand that you are waiting for new features and updates, and we want to assure you that we are working on every aspect of the game. Patience is key to creating a masterpiece, and we appreciate your understanding.
Community of developers: Join our community where you can share your impressions, discuss ideas, and communicate directly with the developers. Your voice is important to us!
Thank you for your support and understanding. Together we will create a game we can be proud to play!

BASIC INFORMATION
"Brand New World" is an exciting real-time strategy game that will take you to a world of endless possibilities. There is no fixed plot in this game, which gives you freedom of action and makes it a real sandbox.

GENERAL FUNCTIONALITY
In this game, you have to build and manage a settlement for your wards in order to protect them from the danger of raiders. You are offered a wide range of options to ensure the balanced development of your settlement. Your characters, whom you control, will be able to extract various resources such as food, wood, stones, as well as hunt animals and create various items on workbenches. Your decisions and strategic skills will influence the development and survival of your settlement.

GRAPHIC DESIGN
Brand New World's graphics features will attract your attention. The game uses low-poly models, which adds a peculiar style to the visual atmosphere of the game. Every detail of the world around you is designed to fully immerse you in this unique and attractive game world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You are given a chance to influence the development of your characters and settlement, forcing you to think strategically and make decisions that will affect the events in the game. Enjoy this immersive game experience where your every move will have meaning and consequences.
